an1.329-332:1: (329) "Bhikkhus, just as even a trifling amount of urine is foul smelling … (330) a trifling amount of saliva is foul smelling … (33) a trifling amount of pus is foul smelling …… (332) a trifling amount of blood is foul smelling, so too I do not praise even a trifling amount of existence, even for a mere finger snap."
